oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Burn. Telegram from Mrs. J.L. Burn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Telegram from Mrs. J.L. Burn, Niota, TN, to Mrs. Geo. Fort Milton, Tenn League of Womens Voters, Nashville, TN. August 19, 1920.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women's suffrage; Politics & government; Telegrams;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814. Please provide a brief description of the material.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: WESTERN UNION TELEGRAM. RECEIVED AT 4 FY WB 45 BLUE COLLECT . NIOTA TENN 830 AM AUG 19 1920 MRS GEO FORT MILTON TENN LEAGUE OF W0MENS VOTERS NASHVILLE TENN I CONGRATULATE YOU UPON VICTORY THAT HAS BEEN WON I AM PROUD THAT MY SON HAD A VOTE IN THIS VICTORY MAKING SESSION I THANK VOU VERY MUCH FOR THE INVERTTATION TO SEE THE RATIFICATION COMPLETED BUT SINCERELY REGRET I CANNOT BE WITH YOU MRS J L BURN 905 A
